name: Call of Honor
description:
Help the sheriff return calm and dimensional life to the Wild West. Clear the city from the hordes of uninvited thugs, smash their favorite tavern and send them out. Stop the cavalry, which furiously seeks to defend their city, for this the faithful horse and reliable shotgun will help the sheriff. Can you stand alone, armed with a machine gun, standing at the gate, who are trying to besiege the crowd of restless thugs, the life of the whole Wild West in your hands!



Call of Honor - Top Down Shooter (Top View) is a game filled with the spirit of the good westerns of our childhood, your choice is given to the town to be cleansed of thugs, horseback riding, protection of the village with a machine gun, all in the spirit of the Hotline Miami.



Game features:
- Difficulty
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
